title: untangle circular deps
body_html:
the problem: if you try to apply the various @symbolic decorators inside most of pytorch, you hit an error due to a circular dependency between the main torch code and torch.onnx.

the fix:

  • move torch/onnx into torch/onnx/core
  • introduce a new torch/onnx/init.py, which forwards a couple methods (like _export()), with torch.onnx.core lazily loaded inside of them
  • move the @symbolic override functionality to torch/onnx/__init.py, and make sure that applying these decorators does not require importing core.
body_text:
the problem: if you try to apply the various @symbolic decorators inside most of pytorch, you hit an error due to a circular dependency between the main torch code and torch.onnx.
the fix:

move torch/onnx into torch/onnx/core
introduce a new torch/onnx/init.py, which forwards a couple methods (like _export()), with torch.onnx.core lazily loaded inside of them
move the @symbolic override functionality to torch/onnx/__init.py, and make sure that applying these decorators does not require importing core.
body:
the problem: if you try to apply the various @symbolic decorators inside most of pytorch, you hit an error due to a circular dependency between the main torch code and torch.onnx.

the fix:

- move torch/onnx into torch/onnx/core
- introduce a new torch/onnx/__init__.py, which forwards a couple methods (like _export()), with torch.onnx.core lazily loaded inside of them
- move the @symbolic override functionality to torch/onnx/__init.py, and make sure that applying these decorators does not require importing core.
